name: Handshake
description:
Global Game Jam 2019. Theme: "What home means to you".

Home is where the close people are.

Physics based arcade game for two players. Try to shake other player's hand :) 

Controls: 

Press buttons repeatedly as if you control spaceship thrust during landing / docking.

1 player: arrows(arm movement) + o, p (hand rotation)
2 player: wasd(arm movement) + c, v (hand rotation)
